name: Head Space (wolfeman99, Musidia, Stefano Farina, AlexAsay)
name_original: Head Space (wolfeman99, Musidia, Stefano Farina, AlexAsay)
description:
OBJECTIVE: Open the Red Door

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Click to interact with items when you are close to them

ENTER to access inventory

1-6 to read notes

CREDITS:

Joshua Wolfe (Producer, Audio Designer, Programmer, Modeler)

Clay Grubbs (Narrative, Puzzles)

Alex Asay (Programmer)

Stefano (Programmer)

Chris Durtschi (Artist, Modeler)
